briefTitle: A Comparison of Dermal Autograft to AlloDerm in Breast Reconstruction
officialTitle: A Comparison of Dermal Autograft to Commercially Available Dermal Allograft in Breast Reconstruction
conditions: Mastectomy Related Lymphedema, Breast Reconstruction, Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Only patients who underwent tissue expander/implant breast reconstruction will be included

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients without the presence of breast cancer or with the presence of the BRCA gene will be excluded
